ASSEMBLE YOUR TEAM OF TROUBLESHOOTERS WITHIN THE NEXT 30 MINUTES TO INVESTIGATE THE MYSTERIOUS CASE OF THE MISSING FILE FOLDER #47321984, WHICH CONTAINS DATA ON THE PRODUCTION LEVELS OF JUICE BOXES FOR THE COMPLEX'S MAIN HIVE.

THIS FOLDER HAS BEEN DECLARED "EYES ONLY" AND ITS RECOVERY IS OF THE UTMOST IMPORTANCE TO ENSURE THE CONTINUOUS FUNCTIONING OF THE COMPLEX'S NUTRITIONAL SUPPLY CHAIN!!!

TO COMPLETE THIS MISSION, YOU WILL NEED TO OBTAIN CLEARANCE LEVEL 7.2 AND SIGN A NON-DISCLOSURE AGREEMENT (NDA) BEFORE ENTERING THE HIGH-RISK ZONE.

**THIS IS NOT A DRILL! OPERATE WITH CAUTION AND DISCRETION AT ALL TIMES!**
